mods.note: Forwarded with compliments to:- The Political Agent, Bahrain, - Persian Gulf Residency, Bahrain,' -By ^araj , Confldontlal. Persian Gulf Residency, Baiirain. 26 th Sep t em n er, 1948• Dear Sir, Thank you for your letter CON - 179 of September 13th in which you were good enough to give we details of your Cojiipe.ny 1 ' agreement with Dr # iJasr concerning dental treatment Tor members of the Company 1 ^ staff. I am grateful to you and Dr. Nasr for the offer of similar facilities for certain meinbers of the staff of H.'f• Residency and Agency which 1 readily accept. I note your remarks in paragraph 2 of yonr % letter. As requested, I enclose herewith a list of the 9 staff concerned. Names may be added to or delated xrom the list as a result of any future changas in the staff. I appreciate your cooperation in this matter. * y I am, Sir, Your obedient Servant, Crow Esq., Bahrain Petroleum Company, Awail .Dental Treatment, List of members of H.M. Residency and agency Staff. Sir Rupert Hay Lady Hay Miss Mary Hay Mr. A.L.A. Dredge Mrs. Dredge Master P. Dredge Miss Tessa Dredge Mr. A.J. Johnson Dr. W.J. Moody Mrs. W. Moody. Miss Moody Mr. C.E. Oldham Mr. A.E. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Dental Treatment for Certain Members of the Residency & Agency Staff'

physicalDescription.extent: There are file notes at the end of the file.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and can be found in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Circled index numbers in red crayon are also present in the volume.

mods.abstract: This file contains one letter with forwarded from the Persian Gulf Residency at Bahrain to the British Political Agent at Bahrain. The letter (f. 3) is from The Persian Gulf Residency to B Crow, Bahrain Petroleum Company at Awali, concerning the offer of dental treatment facilities to Residency staff through the Company's dentist, Dr Nasr. Enclosed with the letter is a list of Residency and Agency staff entitled to dental treatment (f. 4). The file also includes file notes (f. 5).
